EmailTemplate.name: IACP 2011.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: IACP 2011 - Win an iPad2 at TriTech Booth 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join Us for the 118th Annual Conference l October 21-26 l Chicago, IL International Association of Chiefs of Police
ENTER TO WIN AN IPAD 2! Visit http://www.tritech.com/index.php?option=com_k2&view=itemlist&task=category&id=131 and tell us what you think the Future of CAD is and we'll enter you to win an iPad 2!
We get it - you have too many calls, not enough staff and too much pressure. Making sense of the future is our business. We're helping public safety agencies reshape the way they manage information to help them focus on what's important. Do you think your 9-1-1 center needs to be reshaped?
Visit TriTech Booth 2019 to see how our CAD and Mobile solutions are helping our clients reshape the way they manage information.
See It . Believe It. Experience It. Booth #2019.
Copy and paste this URL into any web browswer: http://www.tritech.com/index.php?option=com_k2&view=itemlist&task=category&id=131 for more information.
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121
